item.title: A Look Back At 2020
item.description: ðŸ™€ Anxiety 2020 was tough for many, and for me as well. (Photo by Colton Sturgeon) A couple of days ago, in December 31 at night, I finished the brief review of my 2020 and sent it to Ts, a friend I met on a hike back in 2017. Ts would then make it part of the yearly collection of reviews. There would be about 40 of them, all collected
